revised_title: The Nature of Speech Production and Speech Perception Deficits in Aphasia
tldr: This article discusses the nature of speech production and speech perception deficits in aphasia, focusing on the underlying mechanisms and processes contributing to these disruptions. It explores the different types of errors made by aphasic patients in speech output and the role of phonological and syllable structure in these errors. The article also highlights the importance of understanding the neural substrates for speech production and speech perception in aphasia.
